categories: Category:Shadows of the Empire Sourcebook fiction

nodes.text: Safehouse Besh was a short story printed in Shadows of the Empire Sourcebook.

Bothan spy Koth Melan and his guards (SecOps Four, SecOps Five, and SecOps Seven) are delayed in their return to a safehouse by a foreign object near the entry hatch. The alert is soon discovered to have been triggered by a windblown flexiplast flyer advertising Krazy Khzam's Repulsor Lot. An irritated Koth requests a drink of Gruvian Tovash from SecOps Seven while relaxing after the ordeal.
